description: The dashboard provides insights of Azure Apps via different metrics for app monitoring through Application Insights.

options.content:

${res}

App map

${res}

azureLogAnalytics.query:
union
    (traces
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (requests
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (pageViews
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (dependencies
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customEvents
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (availabilityResults
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (exceptions
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customMetrics
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (browserTimings
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo)
| where notempty(user_Id)
| summarize ['users/count_unique'] = dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| order by timestamp desc

panels.description: The resource path for this panel uses multiple template variables which requires modifying the dashboard JSON directly. If you would like to do something similar please go to Settings > JSON Model. Edit as you'd like in your new copy by going to Settings > Save as.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
union
    (traces
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (requests
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (pageViews
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (dependencies
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customEvents
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (availabilityResults
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (exceptions
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customMetrics
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (browserTimings
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo)
| where notempty(user_Id)
| summarize ['users/count_unique'] = dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp desc

union
    (traces
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (requests
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (pageViews
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (dependencies
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customEvents
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (availabilityResults
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (exceptions
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (customMetrics
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo),
    (browserTimings
    | where timestamp >= $__timeFrom and timestamp < $__timeTo)
| where notempty(session_Id)
| summarize ['sessions/count_unique'] = dcount(session_Id) by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp desc
